projects.name: Expenses Manager
projects.description:
Built because I wanted to learn React and also needed an organized way to see where my monthly expenses were going.
Made a JSON parser, which takes a TD Canada bank statement, which it then categorizes based on predefined expense categories.
Planning on rebuilding this into a more robust application with Vue.js, to add a back-end, and to allow for more user customization as well as user authentication.

projects.name: Full Stack ToDo Application
projects.description:
My first adventure into full stack development.
Built for the learning new technologies which I will be using for an upcoming job.
Wanted to take a different approach than what I usually do when I am learning something, which is watching videos and tutorials. I thought it was time to move past that, built this entirely on my own and recurring to documentation when needed.
Note: pushing new items to the database has been disabled to stop the application from persisting any inappropriate messages that peoplep may add.

projects.name: Portfolio Website Terminal
projects.description:
The current website you are visiting!
Wanted to build something minimalistic-looking, but also different from what I had seen other people do.
I wanted it to be a challenge, so that it would better allow me to improve with and put my Vue.js skills to the test.
